Uses of Interface
org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.DeviceSerialisation

  • Packages that use DeviceSerialisation 
    Package Description
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices
    This package contains classes for 2FA resources and DAOs.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services
    This package contains classes for the OpenAM Authenticator OATH implementation.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services.deviceprint
    This package contains classes for device print attribute management.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services.oath
    This package contains classes for oath device attribute management.
    org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services.push
    This package contains classes for push device attribute management.

    • Uses of DeviceSerialisation in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices

      Classes in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices that implement DeviceSerialisation 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  EncryptedJwtDeviceSerialisation
      Stores device profiles as an encrypted JWT for security.
      class  JsonDeviceSerialisation
      Stores devices as the JSON string serialisation of the device profile.

    • Uses of DeviceSerialisation in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services

      Methods in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services that return DeviceSerialisation 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DeviceSerialisation DeviceService.getDeviceSerialisationStrategy()
      Returns the strategy used for storing devices as profile attributes.
      protected DeviceSerialisation EncryptedDeviceStorage.getDeviceSerialisationStrategy​(String scheme, String keystoreFile, String keystorePass, String keystoreType, String keyPairAlias, String privateKeyPass)
      Returns a strategy which will be used to serialise a device correctly by defining its encryption parameters (if encrypted) or otherwise indicating that it should be simply JSON encoded.

    • Uses of DeviceSerialisation in org.forgerock.openam.core.rest.devices.services.deviceprint
